Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 18th overall pick, by Atlanta in 1979...
Injured on 4/4/1979 with a Inflamed Achilles Tendon, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 8/8/1983, off Steve Rogers (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/9/1983, off Steve Brown (PHI)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1988, hitting .591 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1988, hitting .319 with 6 HR, 26 RBI...
Injured on 9/8/1988 with a Torn Thigh Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 5/28/1990 with a Broken Foot, out for full season...
